com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.finders

Interface FieldFinder.FieldFilter

  • Enclosing class:
    FieldFinder

    public static interface FieldFinder.FieldFilter
    The filter that is used by the find method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accepts(Field field)
      Determines whether this filter accepts a certain field.

    • Method Detail

      • accepts

        boolean accepts(Field field)
        Determines whether this filter accepts a certain field.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to examine
        Returns:
        true if the given field is accepted by this filter or false if this filter denies it
